metadata.title: Extend Audit Backlog Limit for the Audit Daemon in zIPL
metadata.description: Ensure audit_backlog_limit=8192 option is configured in the 'options' line in /boot/loader/entries/*.conf. Make sure that newly installed kernels will retain this option, it should be configured in /etc/kernel/cmdline as well.

criterion.comment: Check if argument audit_backlog_limit=8192 for Linux kernel is present in /boot/loader/entries/.*.conf
Check if argument audit_backlog_limit=8192 for Linux kernel is present in /etc/kernel/cmdline

metadata.title: Enable Auditing to Start Prior to the Audit Daemon in zIPL
metadata.description: Ensure audit=1 option is configured in the 'options' line in /boot/loader/entries/*.conf. Make sure that newly installed kernels will retain this option, it should be configured in /etc/kernel/cmdline as well.

criterion.comment: Check if argument audit=1 for Linux kernel is present in /boot/loader/entries/.*.conf
Check if argument audit=1 for Linux kernel is present in /etc/kernel/cmdline

metadata.title: Deactivate Wireless Network Interfaces
metadata.description: All wireless interfaces should be disabled.

criterion.comment: check if wifi interfaces are disabled

metadata.description: Only members of the group set in variable 'var_pam_wheel_group_for_su' should be able to authenticate through the su command.
